class_ecg module¶

class class_ecg.ECG(filename='test')¶

Bases: object

returns various attributes

Parameters:
  • self (str) – the name of test sample
  • self.time – the list of test time
  • self.voltage – the list of test voltage
  • self.voltage_extremes – tuple containing minimum and maximum lead voltages
  • self.durationtime – time duration of the ECG strip

:param self.num_beat:number of detected beats in the strip :param self.time_beat:numpy array of times when a beat occurred

Returns:different attributes

peak()¶

return the peaks’ information of the ECG data

Parameters:
  • fv – the original list of voltage
  • cd – the list to store the results of correlate

:param cb;a list store correlation results after thereshold :param a : the maximam of the original voltage :param aa: the sample to do the correlate

Returns:return a list include index and value of peaks
Return type:[float,float]
